According to the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP), "Sexuality is a vital aspect of human life, and children are born with the capacity to experience sexual pleasure" (1). Allowing children to explore their sexuality can help them develop their understanding of it, build self-esteem, and foster healthy relationships. In this essay, we will explore the reasons why parents should allow their children to have sex.

1. Sexual Exploration is a Natural Part of Childhood

Children are naturally curious about their bodies and the world around them. According to the National Sleep Foundation, "Children's sexual development is a natural process that begins at birth" (2).
